info.title: HOW TO FIND US?
info.desc: Looking for the perfect place for relaxation, business, or special events in Lviv?
info.contactUs: We’re here for you—reach out however you prefer.
info.contactWithUs: Зв'яжіться з нами будь-яким зручним способом
info.review: If you’d like to leave a review or share your experience with us, please write to us.
info.name: Your name
partnersText: We are open to collaboration on new exciting projects. Send us your proposal at
, and we will get back to you.
careerText: If you love creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere, we’d love to have you on our team! Send your CV to
and become part of our hospitality family.
